Articles.Content:
Also, we should be allowed to rotate the opponents ship to the desired angle just to save ourselves a ~3km trip each turn.... Unless you turn up in something with no delta v, in which case I will want to see evidence of you achieving the impossible.

No. It's a defensive strategy to position a ship in a hard to reach position.

Also, we should be allowed to rotate the opponents ship to the desired angle just to save ourselves a ~3km trip each turn.... Unless you turn up in something with no delta v, in which case I will want to see evidence of you achieving the impossible.

Sure, ill do it. Drek XIV is 450 parts, 100 tons. She's gone into combat once, won it, let's make it 2-2

Course it's not a capital ship, it's a Medium Cruiser... but it's all in the wording
War Eagle, your PM box is full

Havent seen you on in a while

I took a break, was a bit kerbaled out after the whole Laythe project. I'm back now though and glad to see this thread still going strong

War Eagle, your PM box is full

...cleared

No. It's a defensive strategy to position a ship in a hard to reach position.

but all that means is we'll end up flying in 1000m radius circles around each other each turn, the delta v required to reposition is almost nothing, its just a pain in the arse to do it each turn
@ Zekes, I want to do it dumb fire only too, not much point dictating range if you can guide the sucker in..

@ Zekes, I want to do it dumb fire only too, not much point dictating range if you can guide the sucker in..

ok. The Pocket Missiles can be dumb fired, they have dual fuction
yeah, putting a probe on the missile makes sense cause it simplifies the firing sequence. Just post a pic showing it was fired dumb.

yeah, putting a probe on the missile makes sense cause it simplifies the firing sequence. Just post a pic showing it was fired dumb.

ok It just limits range.... 1000m will be hard to hit accurately unless i shoot slow.
I'm going to try and set up a server.

Unidentified craft in our sector. Dreks of 144th are steaming to Intercept.

Can someone help me with this?

I'll try and set one up tomorrow, have you got a link to the mod? I'm really keen to try out multiplayer ( puts backwards pointing engines on all his designs) so I'd love to ge this working but I doubt I'll have any more luck than you did.
I'm going to build a plane and try to fix this later.

It's just so much easier to turn the target ship than fly around it.. We can try another where we are strictly pointed at each other and reduce the range each turn, to simulate 2 ships closing. at 1000m there's not much chance of us scoring any hits end to end.

Wow... that was a close shot. USSZS Riley Lets looses the first shot; it proves good.

Looks like the missiles are gone, but I can't be sure. Next shot will go up the barrel and hopefully kill it completely.
